A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible. Actual fans of Star Wars with expectations surrounding these legendary characters will be sorely disappointed. The story is full of plot holes. Rampant political messaging has taken the forefront over good storytelling\, and this trainwreck makes the prequels seem competent. This film absolutely betrays the character of Luke Skywalker\, and completely ignores its own logical gaps in the pursuit of what seems to be a feminist sjw agenda. Star Wars under Kathleen Kennedy has ceased to be Star Wars at all. One star to be certain that its counted (It would be zero otherwise).
